step_2_text: Welcome to Roslyn Examples - the introduction is automatically generated
step_3_text: If you want to see more examples , see  [List Of RSCG] https://ignatandrei.github.io/RSCG_Examples/v2/docs/List-of-RSCG
step_5_text: My name is Andrei Ignat and I am deeply fond of Roslyn Source Code Generator.
step_6_text: Today I will present MakeInterface.Generator  that is good for Generating interface from class definition .
step_8_text: You can download the code from https://ignatandrei.github.io/RSCG_Examples/v2/docs/MakeInterface.Generator
step_14_text: You put the  [MakeInterface.Generator](https://www.nuget.org/packages/MakeInterface.Generator/) into the csproj
step_16_text: I have used the MakeInterface.Generator in those files
